author: deluckybrick
title: Finally, a review of a supplementary set...
review: This set was in the first three I ever got, and it is extremely useful.  You can -duh- use the wheels to make cars, but they are also useful for anything which might need to spin or anything like that.  I have found many uses for them.  But really the usual use is on cars, so that is what I will discuss.  You get enough wheels and tires to make 6 cars, two with small wheels and two with big wheels.  I would recommend getting this set if you already have, say, 5130 or something of the like to make cars from.  This set is good for supplying much needed wheels.

author: Alemas
title: They are wheels and tyres alright...
review:
This has a lot of wheels and tyres! It has a lot of small tyres, small wheels, Freestyle wheels(with pin-hole) and tyres, and the bricks needed to connect them!

Pros
- Lots of tyres
- Lots of wheels
- Lots of wheel-connector bricks

Cons
- None!

Overall, a great supplementary set!
